issue.title: [R] Strip arrow.so
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9449](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9449). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Recent changes ballooned the size of the shared library that gets built in the R package, especially with the bundled libs on linux. It turns out we can add something to the makefile to strip it: http://dirk.eddelbuettel.com/blog/2017/08/14/#009_compact_shared_libraries
